DOC.brief_summary: This open-label , non-randomized , multi-center , patient sponsor study Adipose-Derived Stromal vascular fraction cell implantation via intravenous infusion . The intent clinical study answer question : 1 ) Is propose treatment safe 2 ) Is treatment effective improve disease pathology patient diagnose Type II Diabetes Mellitus .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Effects Autologous Adipose-Derived Stromal Cells Delivered Patients With Type II Diabetes
DOC.criteria: Males Females Age 18 80 year . Type 2 diabetes mellitus ( guideline WHO , 1999 ) ; Body mass index ( BMI ) ≤35㎏/㎡ ; Fast blood glucose ( FBG ) ≥7.0 mmol/L , Hemoglobin A1c ( HgbA1c ) ≥7％ ; Up date age gender appropriate cancer screen per American Cancer Society . Females pregnant nursing female childbearing potential unwilling maintain contraceptive therapy duration study Life expectancy < 6 month due concomitant illness . Exposure investigational drug procedure within 1 month prior study entry enrol concurrent study may confound result study . Active infectious disease . If patient test positive , consulted patient eligibility base patient 's infectious status Any illness , Investigator 's judgment , interfere patient 's ability comply protocol , compromise patient safety , interfere interpretation study result Patients chronic immunosuppressive transplant therapy Systolic blood pressure ( supine ) ≤90 mmHg > 180mmHg Resting heart rate > 100 bpm ; Active clinical infection within one week enrollment . Known drug alcohol dependence factor interfere study conduct interpretation result opinion investigator suitable participate . History cancer ( nonmelanoma skin cancer insitu cervical cancer ) last five year . Unwilling and/or able give write informed consent .
